function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of sustainable production and consumption methods","Impact":"Resource depletion, environmental damage, and public health risks","Mitigation":"Implement sustainable production and consumption methods, promote responsible economy","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, sustainable agriculture practices","People":"Public, future generations","Owner":"Government, corporations"},{"Description":"Lack of social integration in global terms","Impact":"Social inequality, insufficient access to housing, healthcare, and education","Mitigation":"Integrate social aspects into global projects, prioritize social needs","Technologies":"Urban planning technologies, public health management systems","People":"Underprivileged communities, marginalized groups","Owner":"Local governments, international organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of protection and improvement of the environment","Impact":"Environmental degradation, loss of natural resources, and heightened exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement environmental protection measures, promote sustainable resource management","Technologies":"Waste management technologies, environmental monitoring systems","People":"General public, future generations","Owner":"Environmental agencies, global community"}]}
